comment.author: 35687899@N00
comment._content: 1100 25th Street NW is a condo building on the northwest corner of 25th and Pennsylvania Avenue, built in 1913 and renovated a few years ago.  The ground-floor retail options on that corner are a PNC Bank as well as a Trader Joe's across the street, neither of which would have been around DC for Gullickson to visit back then.

comment._content: Founder and editor of the Record Changer magazine. See Kiplinger Magazine for November 1947: books.google.com/books?id=6P4DAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA13&lp...
